mapper.insert: insert into game_data ( id, user_id, username, strength, fight_count, equipment, money, career, equipped, res_data, online_time) value ( null, #{user_id}, #{username}, #{strength}, #{fight_count}, #{equipment}, #{money}, #{carrer}, #{equipped}, #{res_data}, #{online_time})
mapper.select: select id ,user_id ,username ,strength ,fight_count ,equipment ,money ,career ,equipped ,res_data ,online_time from game_data where user_id = #{user_id}
